headline: How New Deals and Valuation Shifts Are Rewriting the Story for Netflix
summary: Netflix's latest valuation update reflects only minor tweaks to its long term story, with fair value nudged from $134.65 to $134.44 per share. The model now assumes a slightly lower discount rate, easing from 9.10% to about 9.07%, while long run revenue growth is held effectively steady at roughly 11.76% as analysts balance robust engagement and ad driven upside against execution and strategic risks. As this evolving mix of optimism and caution shapes Netflix's narrative, readers can monitor...
